description.desc1: The 3d representation of a LedStrip. This node is subsequently used by the PixelPusher node
description.desc2: The LedStrip file is created inside Blender with the LedStrip-Exporter script.

Filename.descript: select the LedStrip file. This file needs to be generated with Blender and the LedStrip-exporter

direction.descript: which end is connected towards the controller

leds per meter.descript: how many leds per meter are on this segment

inset.descript: number of black leds at the beginning of the segment

outset.descript: number of black leds at the end of the segment

swap.descript: swap this segment with the one above/below

IndexRenderGroup.descript: set the render group for the indexing renderpass. Capture/BoxMapCapture have an equivalent in which you can choose which group to render.

PreviewRenderGroup.descript: set the render group for the preview renderpass. This rendering of the LedStrip is for preview purposes only.

publish transformation.descript: publishes this mode transformation as a transformation node

shader.descript: shader applied to the 3d preview representation of the LedStrip. Usually a xxxProjection-shader is used to achieve the desired results.

ledsize.descript: the preview display size of the individual leds.

show unused segments.descript: Unused Segements inside the LEdStrip file can be displayed.

set all leds per meter value.descript: This sets the 'leds per meter' values for all the selected segements

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
